metadata.Title: CVE-2021-26247 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: As an unauthenticated remote user, visit "http://<CACTI_SERVER>/auth_changepassword.php?ref=<script>alert(1)</script>" to successfully execute the JavaScript payload present in the "ref" URL parameter.

criterions.comment: cacti: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
